card_faces.oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top card of your library. You may reveal that card. If an instant or sorcery card is revealed this way, transform Delver of Secrets.

card_faces.name: Insectile Aberration
card_faces.flavor_text:
"Unfortunately, all my test animals have died or escaped, so I shall be the final subject. I feel no fear. This is a momentous night."
—Laboratory notes, final entry

name: Phyrexian Arena
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
flavor_text: A spark of resistance against a tide of corruption.

name: Dismissive Pyromancer
oracle_text:
{R}, {T}, Discard a card: Draw a card.
{2}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Dismissive Pyromancer: It deals 4 damage to target creature.
flavor_text: "Burn. Burn. Keep. Burn".

name: Grateful Apparition
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Grateful Apparition deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

name: Perilous Myr
oracle_text: When Perilous Myr dies, it deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor_text: To Mirrodin, an explosive. To Phyrexia, a missionary.

name: Lightning Strike
oracle_text: Lightning Strike deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor_text: To wield lightning is to tame chaos.

name: Thieving Skydiver
oracle_text:
Kicker {X}. X can't be 0. (You may pay an additional {X} as you cast this spell.)
Flying
When Thieving Skydiver enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, gain control of target artifact with converted mana cost X or less. If that artifact is an Equipment, attach it to Thieving Skydiver.

name: Beetleback Chief
oracle_text: When Beetleback Chief enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
flavor_text: Whether trained, ridden, or eaten, few goblin military innovations have rivaled the bug.

name: Basilisk Collar
oracle_text:
Equipped creature has deathtouch and lifelink.
Equip {2}
flavor_text: During their endless travels, the mages of the Goma Fada caravan have learned ways to harness both life and death.

name: Migratory Route
oracle_text:
Create four 1/1 white Bird creature tokens with flying.
Basic landcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.)

name: Merfolk Trickster
oracle_text:
Flash
When Merfolk Trickster enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. It loses all abilities until end of turn.
flavor_text: Saved from destruction by one planeswalker's sacrifice, the Eliterate colony forswore the taking of life.

name: Awakening Zone
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may create a 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."
flavor_text: The ground erupted in time with the hedron's thrum, a dirge of the last days.

name: Opulent Palace
oracle_text:
Opulent Palace enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B}, {G}, or {U}.
flavor_text: The dense jungle surrenders to a lush and lavish expanse. At its center uncoil the spires of Qarsi Palace.

name: Fabled Hero
oracle_text:
Double strike
Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Fabled Hero, put a +1/+1 counter on Fabled Hero.
flavor_text: "You. Poet. Be sure to write this down."

name: Tragic Slip
oracle_text:
Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
Morbid — That creature gets -13/-13 until end of turn instead if a creature died this turn.
flavor_text: Linger on death's door and risk being invited in.

name: Champion of the Parish
oracle_text: Whenever another Human enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Champion of the Parish.
flavor_text: "I stand for every cobbler, tanner, and fool in this town—and they stand for me."

name: Generous Patron
oracle_text:
When Generous Patron enters the battlefield, support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two other target creatures.)
Whenever you put one or more counters on a creature you don't control, draw a card.

name: Dreamstealer
oracle_text:
Menace
Whenever Dreamstealer deals combat damage to a player, that player discards that many cards.

name: Hinterland Harbor
oracle_text:
Hinterland Harbor enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Forest or an Island.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}.
flavor_text:
"Our ancestors brought down a Phyrexian portal ship, then built our town on its hull. We're pretty proud of that."
—Alene of Riverspan

name: Exhume
oracle_text: Each player puts a creature card from their graveyard onto the battlefield.
flavor_text:
"Death—an outmoded concept. We sleep, and we change."
—Sitrik, birth priest

name: Briarhorn
oracle_text:
Flash
When Briarhorn enters the battlefield, target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
Evoke {1}{G} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)
set_name: Duel Decks: Nissa vs. Ob Nixilis

name: Ghostly Pilferer
oracle_text:
Whenever Ghostly Pilferer becomes untapped, you may pay {2}. If you do, draw a card.
Whenever an opponent casts a spell from anywhere other than their hand, draw a card.
Discard a card: Ghostly Pilferer can't be blocked this turn.

name: Standstill
oracle_text: When a player casts a spell, sacrifice Standstill. If you do, each of that player's opponents draws three cards.
flavor_text: "Take your time."

name: Fecundity
oracle_text: Whenever a creature dies, that creature's controller may draw a card.
flavor_text: Life is eternal. A lifetime is ephemeral.

name: Trinket Mage
oracle_text: When Trinket Mage enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost 1 or less, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.
